interpretation_low: Low trail density - limited recreational access
interpretation_high: High trail density - intensive recreational use
notes: Trail density in km/ha from OSM footways/cycleway/bridleway
Multimodal accessibility score combining roads and public transport
Standing timber volume m³/ha from allometric equations

interpretation_low: Low site productivity - poor site conditions
interpretation_high: High site productivity - optimal growth conditions
notes: Site productivity index m³/ha/yr based on fertility × climate × species
Composite timber quality score for construction/sawlog use
Mobilizable fuelwood tonnes dry matter/year from harvest residues + coppice

interpretation_low: Low carbon substitution - minimal climate benefit
interpretation_high: High carbon substitution - strong climate mitigation
notes: CO2 emission avoidance tCO2eq/year via energy + material substitution
Minimum distance to roads/buildings/powerlines in meters
Continuous forest patch area in hectares after 100m buffer-dissolve
Composite wilderness index integrating N1 × N2 × ancientness × protection
